meanings.sent1: The purchasers at the store were excited to buy new toys.
meanings.sent2: Online purchasers often read reviews before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The purchasers at the bakery couldn't resist the smell of fresh bread.
meanings.sent4: In a world of book lovers, she stood out as the ultimate purchaser of rare editions.
meanings.sent5: The purchasers in the market were like bees buzzing around the sweetest flowers.

meanings.definition: Those who acquire goods or services in exchange for money.
meanings.sent1: The purchasers of the new smartphone were impressed by its features.
meanings.sent2: Holiday season brings in a lot of purchasers looking for gifts.
meanings.sent3: The purchasers of the concert tickets were thrilled to see their favorite band.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the top purchaser of designer handbags in the city.
meanings.sent5: The purchasers of the limited edition sneakers waited eagerly in line.
